title: Update Skyra header branding and refresh application imagery with metro/buildings/facades/furniture photos

requirements.text: Update the top navigation branding so the upper-left brand area displays the text “Skyra” and removes the logo image (no `/assets/generated/skyra-logo.dim_512x512.png` in the navbar). Keep the existing click-to-scroll-to-top behavior on the brand area.

quotes: write skyra on upper left hand side remove the logo

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/TopNav.tsx`, the logo `` is removed from the navbar brand lockup.
The navbar brand area visibly shows the text “Skyra” on the upper-left on all screen sizes.
Clicking the brand area still scrolls the page to the top smoothly.

requirements.text: Replace the hero background image overlay with a new outdoor metro station photo featuring visible tiles (instead of the current tiles pattern image).

quotes: use outdoor metro station picture with tiles

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/HeroSection.tsx`, the background overlay image no longer uses `/assets/generated/skyra-tiles-pattern.dim_1600x900.png` and uses the new generated metro-station image instead.
The hero section still renders correctly in light/dark modes with legible text over the new background image.

requirements.text: Update the Applications section card images so: (1) “Metro & Railway Stations” uses an outdoor metro station photo featuring tiles, and (2) “Public Buildings”, “Walls & Facades”, and “Urban Furniture” each use their own distinct photos (not the shared tiles pattern).

quotes: use outdoor metro station picture with tiles
apply picture Public Buildings, Walls & Facades, Urban Furniture

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/ApplicationsSection.tsx`, the “Metro & Railway Stations” card image is updated to the new outdoor metro station tiles photo.

In `frontend/src/components/skyra/ApplicationsSection.tsx`, the “Public Buildings”, “Walls & Facades”, and “Urban Furniture” card images are updated to three distinct new images (not `/assets/generated/skyra-tiles-pattern.dim_1600x900.png`).
All application card images render without layout shifts and keep the same aspect ratio and hover behavior.

requirements.text: Add the new generated images to `frontend/public/assets/generated` and reference them directly from the React components (no backend routing for images).

quotes: use outdoor metro station picture with tiles
apply picture Public Buildings, Walls & Facades, Urban Furniture

acceptanceCriteria: All new images are present under `frontend/public/assets/generated` with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
The hero and applications sections load the new images via `/assets/generated/...` paths.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose using them only).
Do not modify any files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` from SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for these UI/image updates.
nonGoals: Do not add new landing page sections or change existing section order.
Do not remove or change the favicon or other existing branding assets unless explicitly required by the header change.

required: Outdoor metro station scene with visible tiling (skyra-hero-metro-station.dim_1600x900.png)
Outdoor metro station scene with visible tiling, framed for a 4:3 card crop (skyra-application-metro-outdoor.dim_1400x900.png)
Public building exterior with architectural facade detail (skyra-application-public-buildings.dim_1400x900.png)
Urban wall/facade surface detail suitable for a vertical-surface concept (skyra-application-walls-facades.dim_1400x900.png)
